summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; making appropriations from the Engineering Operating Fund and the Arterial City Street Fund in aid of the cost of providing arterial level lighting in the Mount Baker area along Lakewood Avenue South from South Court Street to Cascadia Avenue South and certain other streets, avenues and alleys (Lakewood Avenue South, et al, Local Improvement District No. 6703); and increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1981 Budget of the Engineering Department therefor.
